title: Monsters / Creatures / Heroes Sounds Pack
description: Combination of 12 voice actors, sound design, and sound effects, with everything from cuddly creatures to vicious beasts. Includes dozens of different settings, and characters to work with.
longDescription:
🔊 Listen to the Preview Here

📄 Check the File List

Ever wondered when looking at the graceful games, why do they look so captivating? This is the merit of sounds!

In Ishodus Studio we specialize in the development and creation of the sounds you need to fill your game world with new colors. We have created a whole set of sounds such as environments, characters, monsters, interactions, weapons, gore, footsteps, and more to make your project sound amazing.


The perfect solution to give your fantasy game dozens of variations for voices and sounds of fantasy creatures, monsters and heroes.


This pack contains 2982 high-quality and Triple AAA quality sounds of animals, creatures, monsters and heroes like Angry, Introduction, Sad, Surprised, Jump, 3 types of Laughs, Realization, Scared, Jargon, 2 types of Death, Confused, Tired, 3 types of Attack, 2 types of Hurt and some specific for everyone.


📄 Includes 12 voice actors, 3 categories and 90 entities - each entity has his own style and a lot of variations📄

📄 Categories:📄

  • Monsters - Demon, Hawk, GoblinDog, LargeCat, RaptorGargoyle, Ghosts, Temptrees, Fire beast, Shock warrior, Ghast, Ghoul, Phantasm, Reapers. Whisperers, Human Tribal, Gnome female, Gremlin, Imp female, Imp male, Lizards, Serpent, Trolls, Zombie, Slime, Rock Giant, Vile Slug Giant.
  • Creatures - Parakeet, Parrot, Squawk Parrot, Bird, Cow, Horse, Owl. Ghost, Ghost Phantasm, Baby creature, Bird, Child creature, Foolish, Curious Goblin, Frogling, Fuzzy Imp, Gelfing Female, Gnome, Kitty Girl, Ogre Tired, Orc, Small Skesis, Squeaky Mon, Squirrel, Tiny Creature, Tiny Cute, Ancient Treant, Rock Giant, Tree Folk Female, Tree Folk Male.
  • Heroes - April, Aria, Brandy, Celia, Karen, Kerlih, Young Karen, Young Kerlih, Witch Richard, Cave Man Alex, David, Jamaal, Nile, Patrick, Richard, Epic David, Ogre Jamaal, Vampire Richard.


BRING LIFE TO YOUR WORLD WITH - Monsters / Creatures / Heroes Sounds Pack!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 2982

Number of Audio Cues: 2982

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz/ 3072 kbps

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 78 minutes, 1 hours 17 minutes 58 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
